related_questions.question: I want to read some advertisement So I will borrow​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Newspaper

Penjelasan:

it's because newspaper contain some advertisement in it

Jawaban:

I want to read some advertisement So I will borrow​ your newspaper / magazine.

Penjelasan:

Penulis ingin membaca beberapa iklan, jadi penulis akan meminjam koran / majalahmu untuk membacanya karena biasanya iklan (Advertisement) terdapat di koran / majalah.

Semoga membantu ya.

related_questions.question:
6. Siti : I have a toothache    Lina : You should go to the ....
a. doctor b. dentist c. lawyer
d. hospital​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

b. dentist

Penjelasan:

Karena Siti mengalami sakit gigi, maka Siti harus pergi ke dokter gigi (dentist).

Doctor = dokter

Dentist = dokter gigi

Lawyer = pengacara

Hospital = rumah sakit

Semoga membantu :)

related_questions.question: What does the underlined word rever to ?

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

Apa yang dimaksud dengan kata yang digarisbawahi?

Penjelasan:

maaf klo slh, semoga membantu<3

Answer =

The bottom line means lines made under the letters (letters, words, sentences, etc.) to state that the words (sentences and so on) that are given a line are important,
Underlines are lines under a text

The meanning (in Indonesia) = apa yang dimaksud dengan kata yang digarisbawahi.

I hope this helps

related_questions.question: Please di jawab dong buat besok nih?​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

My dad bought me a dog on my birthday. It is a male golden retriever dog. His name is Choco. I really love him as my pet.

Penjelasan:

Artinya:

Ayah saya membelikan saya seekor an jing di hari ulang tahun saya. Ia adalah seekor an jing golden retriever jantan. Namanya adalah Choco. Saya sangat menyayanginya sebagai hewan peliharaan.

Semoga membantu :)
